column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////My roommate and I shared a small Lou's deep dish pizza. So good.  nothing was over done
column2: it was cheesey and delicious.  They give you a perfect amount of toppings.  The service was great and very friendly.  They told us the pizza would take about 30 mins
column3: which it did.  That is not a bad thing at all
column4: in fact that means they actually make the pizza. We did not get drinks
column5: but they had a nice looking bar.  The decour was nice and relaxing.  Great experience.
